name: Assicurazioni Generali S.p.A
goal: Generali is one of the largest global insurance and asset management providers. Established in 1831, it is present in 50 countries in the world, with a total premium income of more than € 66 billion in 2018. With nearly 71,000 employees serving 61 million customers, the Group has a leading position in Europe and an increasingly significant presence in Asia and Latin America. The ambition of Generali is to be a “life-time partner” to its customers, offering innovative and customised solutions thanks to an unrivalled distribution network.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
